channel.title: 6 Minute English on SWIEST - Transcripts · Screenplays · Lyrics
channel.description: Recent content in 6 Minute English on SWIEST - Transcripts · Screenplays · Lyrics

item.title: Could we live without plastic? | 6 Minute English
item.description: Podcast Description Is it time to start living without plastic? Beth and Neil discuss this. Transcript

item.title: Invasive species: Why don't we eat them? | 6 Minute English
item.description: Podcast Description Invasive species are causing problems for nature around the world, so why not eat them? Transcript

item.title: What and where is Little Italy? | 6 Minute English
item.description: Podcast Description How did Italian food become famous throughout the world? Find out with Neil and Georgie Transcript

item.title: Social media and teenage health | 6 Minute English
item.description: Podcast Description What are the risks of social media to teenage health and what can be done about them? Transcript

item.title: Mystery flying objects | 6 Minute English
item.description: Podcast Description What exactly did navy pilots see in 2004? The US investigates these UFOs now, in 2023. Transcript

item.title: Elephant-proof farming | 6 Minute English
item.description: Podcast Description What happens when an elephant wants to eat your crops? How can you stop it? Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Is it OK to eat animals that can feel emotion? Learn vocabulary on this topic. Transcript

item.title: Ways to live for 100 years | 6 Minute English
item.description: Podcast Description More and more people are living to 100, but what is the secret of a long life? Transcript

item.title: How green is your money? | 6 Minute English
item.description: Podcast Description Should climate change make us think where to invest our money? Learn useful vocabulary. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Today the medicinal mushroom industry is big business. But are there actually benefits? Transcript

item.title: Saving dead languages | 6 Minute English
item.description: Podcast Description Some Australian languages have been saved from extinction. We discuss Barngala’s revival. Transcript

item.title: Sounds that make you want to scream | 6 Minute English
item.description: Podcast Description Some sounds cause some people huge distress. Learn about ‘misophonia’ here. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Fandom is more than simply being a fan, and now it is developing its own language. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Do men find it harder than women to make close friendships? Neil and Beth discuss. Transcript

item.title: Space-saving solar hacks | 6 Minute English
item.description: Podcast Description How can we find space for new solar panels? Transcript

item.title: Do you have eco-anxiety? | 6 Minute English

item.description: Podcast Description Neil and Beth talk about different ways of apologising. Transcript

item.title: Is the recycling system broken? | 6 Minute English
item.description: Podcast Description We talk about the over-reliance on recycling rather than reducing the use of plastics Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description How can books help us relax and feel more alive during troubled times? Transcript

item.title: Shocking facts about electricity | 6 Minute English
item.description: Podcast Description Neil and Georgina talk about how electrical systems differ from country to country. Transcript

item.title: Internet - good or bad? | 6 Minute English
item.description: Podcast Description Rob and Neil discuss some of the advantages and drawbacks of going online Transcript
